description:
One of the more interesting aspects of any life sim for me is always going to be the generational gameplay. While the game worlds of InZoi and The Sims are frozen in time, the families that dwell in them are not. They live, work, have kids, and die, just like we do. It's a fun and not-so-serious way to reflect on some potentially very heavy subjects. But first things first: you can't have generational gameplay until you start making some babies. And in InZoi, making babies is slightly less straightforward than it is in real life.

As it is in The Sims, your Zois cannot get pregnant in InZoi simply by having sex. Your Zoi can participate in all the carnal activities they can convince other Zois to do with them, but they're just not going to get pregnant by accident. To try to get pregnant, your Zois will first have to get marr
title: How To Have A Baby In InZoi
Asus Charger Dock - Save Over 50% On This Great Steam Deck & Handheld PC Gadget

description: Several hardcover editions of Matt Dinniman's Dungeon Crawler Carl novel series are featured in Amazon's Buy Two, Get One Free Book Sale. Dungeon Crawler Carl is one of the most popular series in the LitRPG space, a burgeoning subgenre of fantasy and sci-fi that injects video game tropes like stats, health bars, and inventory screens into prose novels. Dinniman's darkly comedic series has become a mainstream hit over the past few years; the seventh novel in the series, The Inevitable Ruin, is currently in Amazon's top 10 mos
title: Dungeon Crawler Carl's New Hardcover Editions Are B2G1 Free At Amazon

description:
After garnering positive reviews on PC and Xbox, Indiana Jones and the Great Circle is finally making the jump to PS5 on April 17. Preorders are now open for three different versions of the game, one of which is loaded with collectible items. You'll also get some in-game exclusives regardless of which version you preorder. Our Indiana Jones and the Great Circle review gave the game an impressive 9 out of 10, so if you haven't had a chance to join the archaeologist on his latest adventure, picking it up on PS5 is an easy recommendation.

Indiana Jones and the Great Circle Preorder Bonuses
title: Indiana Jones And The Great Circle PS5 Edition Preorders Are Live, Including A Collector's Edition
New Dragonlance Chronicles Omnibus Is Back In Stock And On Sale At Amazon

description: The Fortnite Festival Edition CRKD Neo S is on sale for $50 at Amazon during the retailer's Big Spring Sale. Normally $60, the $10 discount matches the best deal yet for CRKD's awesome wireless Nintendo Switch and PC controller. The officially licensed gamepad has a 5-fret button attachment, making it the ideal way to play Fortnite's Guitar Hero-esque game mode with a standard controller.
title: Fortnite-Themed Wireless Controller With Guitar Fret Buttons Is On Sale At Amazon

description: Stephen Kick and Larry Kuperman visit us to talk about System Shock 2: 25th Anniversary Remaster, working with the community, and the importance of preservation.
title: Nightdive Talks About Works With the Community On System Shock 2: 25th Anniversary Remaster

description:
It has been a long wait for a sequel to 2021's Mortal Kombat, but at long last, Earthrealm's finest are ready to make their grand return. The first film did a solid job in reintroducing Mortal Kombat to movie-watching audiences, as its combination of brutally choreographed fight scenes, subtle nods to the franchise, and sharp banter made for an enjoyable experience. The sequel is promising to be even bigger and bloodier than its predecessor, and while it'll still be several months before it arrives, it sounds like fans will be in for a thrilling ride. Here's everything that we know so far about Mortal Kombat 2.


What is the Mortal Kombat 2 movie about?


The 2021 Mortal Kombat movie put a fascinating new spin on the
title: Mortal Kombat 2 Movie: Release Date And Everything We Know So Far

description:
A new report is raising more questions about when Nintendo Switch 2 preorders will go live at major retailers, with two conflicting dates now circulating.

The report comes from Insider Gaming, which states it has seen internal emails and documents from a large US retailer confirming the Switch 2 will release in June (as has been heavily rumored). However, the documents also state preorders for Switch 2 will go live on April 9, a week after a Switch 2-focused Nintendo Direct on April 2 that will offer more details about the console and, presumably, its release date and launch games.
title: New Nintendo Switch 2 Report Raises Questions On When Preorders Will Go Live

description:
Netflix's top gaming boss, Alain Tascan, has said he questions whether or not young people these days even care about consoles. Speaking at an event at GDC 2025 recently, Tascan said he personally enjoys console gaming, but he's not sure if it's where gaming is headed in the future. Of course, Tascan would say this, as his company, Netflix Games, does not make consoles and is instead intent on pushing people toward streaming and subscription services.

"[When it comes to] console, we started to look at the future where the platform is agnostic," he said, as reported by The Game Business. "Look at the younger generation. Are eight-year-olds and 10-year-olds dreaming of owning a
title: Netflix's Gaming Boss Wonders If Young People Even Want A New Console

description: HoYoverse's gacha RPG regularly receives working codes for freebies and rewards to help you on your travels. Some come from livestreams, or during events, whereas others may be obtained via social media. We've collected all of the Honkai Star Rail codes in one handy list, along with instructions on how to redeem them.
title: Honkai Star Rail Codes March 2025 For Free Stellar Jade, Credits, And More
Pokemon Detective Pikachu 4K Steelbook Preorders Are Cheap At Amazon

description:
InZoi is a new life sim on PC, which is available now in Steam Early Access. This game offers similar features as its competitor, The Sims, and there are plenty of ways to customize and make your InZoi characters and city feel unique to your gameplay. Here, we'll guide you through some of the ways you can change the appearance of your city, including adding various weather elements.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • How to change the weather

How to change the weather

The second icon in the bottom right corner of your HUD will take you to the Edit City menu, or you can click the M button on your keyboard.

From here, click on the City Appearance tab at the top of
title: How To Change The Weather And City Environments In InZoi

description: Jean-Luc joins Kurt Indovina to talk about Rebellion's latest game: Atomfall.
title: Atomfall Might Be The Biggest Surprise of 2025

description:
Call of Duty's battle against cheaters continues, and ahead of Season 3's launch for Black Ops 6 and Warzone, Activision has released a blog detailing the new efforts to combat those unsavory players. Here are all the big changes announced for Call of Duty's Ricochet anti-cheat and the fight against hackers.

Activision confirmed the previous report that several Call of Duty cheat providers have been shut down. The publisher says that "over 20 cheat makers and dozens of cheat resellers" have been terminated since the launch of Black Ops 6, and tha
title: How Call Of Duty Is Stepping Up Efforts To Fight Cheaters
Banpresto Taiko No Tatsujin Jumbo Plush Is Available Now

description:
Call of Duty's Ricochet anti-cheat team is cracking down on those who have earned gun camos through ill-gotten means in Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 and Call of Duty: Warzone, issuing temporary bans and even removing dishonorably obtained skins mid-match.

In a post from the official Call of Duty Updates X account, the Ricochet anti-cheat team made clear that using exploits or "unauthorized methods," such as external tools, violates the game's security and enforcement policy and will result in temporary bans.

RICOCHET anti-cheat's late
title: Activision Is Cracking Down On Call Of Duty Camo Cheaters

description:
Warhorse's celebrated RPG Kingdom Come: Deliverance II is now available without DRM. The popular RPG has launched today, March 28, on the DRM-free game store, GOG. Additionally, a special quest that was previously only available as a preorder bonus is now available for everyone to buy.

The game's $60 Standard and $80 Gold editions are available to buy now on GOG. The Gold edition includes a variety of extras, including post-launch expansions and the Gallant Huntsman's Kit.

Kingcome Come: Deliverance II originally launched in early February for PC via Steam and the Epic Games Store. It's also available via GameSpot's sister site
title: Kingdom Come 2 Is Now Available DRM-Free, As Preorder Quest Now Available For Everyone To Buy

description: The developers of Phasmophobia visited us to talk about the new release on console and how the team and game has grown over the last 5 years.
title: Phasmophobia Devs Look Back on 5 Years of Success

description:
InZoi is a life sim in the style of The Sims. However, it does a lot of things that are unique to games like it and will be new to anyone coming over from EA's genre leader. Even when InZoi does offer mechanics similar to those in The Sims, InZoi often does them differently. For fans of the genre, it's almost like learning a new language with some of the same cognates. That's why we've put together our InZoi guides hub, which is full of helpful hints and walkthroughs for a variety of the game's biggest features, subtle touches, and everything in between.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • InZoi guides

InZoi guides

Our InZoi guides cover a wide rang
title: InZoi Guides Hub
Vampire Survivors Is Getting An Official Hardcover Lore Book, And Preorders Are Live

description:
Bandai Namco has revealed some statistics from the Elden Ring Nightreign network test ahead of the game's May 30 release date.

Elden Ring
title: Elden Ring Nightreign's Network Test Included Over 30 Billion Lost Runes

description:
Midway through the Dr. Garrow investigation in Atomfall, you'll be tasked with visiting a Dam Data Store to access some files for the good doctor. Dr. Garrow makes it clear that you are to run a specific command on the computer and not to read any of the files, which apparently relate to the Windscale disaster that occurred recently. This quest comes right after Dr. Garrow made you go and retrieve her research files in a separate part of the Interchange.

However, the Dam Data Store is not in the Interchange. Instead, you'll have to visit Casterfell Woods to enter the Data Store and run the ERA Command for her. Below, you can see an entire walkthrough for this part of the Dr. Garrow investigation in Atomfall.


Entering the Casterfell Dam Data Store
title: How To Find Atomfall Data Dam Store And Run ERA Command For Dr. Garrow

description:
The Interchange is at the center of everything in Atomfall. It's the first destination you're told to visit to try and piece together what happened to the world you woke up in. The entire plot of Atomfall revolves around this central location that's mired in mystery and intrigue. Throughout your journey, you're given various leads on how to enter the Interchange. If you explore enough, you'll even discover that the Interchange has an entrance in all four major regions of the Quarantine Zone.

Eventually, the mysterious person on the telephone will ask you to find all four Interchange doors. If this task wasn't enough, you're then told to find and power on four Data Store Rooms inside the Interchange to progress the story in Atomfall.

If you're struggling with either one of these tasks, don't worry, as we've lis
title: How To Find All Atomfall Interchange Doors And Data Store Rooms

description:
Originally released for Nintendo DS in 2008, Nintendo is reviving Story of Season: Grand Bazaar for Switch and PC. The remake was revealed during the latest Nintendo Direct, and it's shaping up to be another relaxing outing for the farming/life simulator, thanks to reworked graphics, a new mode of transportation in the wind glider, and a cast of new characters and events. Preorders are now open ahead of its August 27 release.

Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar Preorder Bonus

There are currently no preorder bonuses for Story of Seasons: Granda Bazaar. If anything changes (or any retailer-exclusives pop up), we'll be sure to update this section.
title: Story of Seasons: Grand Bazaar Preorders Are Live, Including A Premium Physical Edition

description:
Nintendo Switch owners can swap out their Joy-Con for a GameCube-inspired controller for less during Amazon's Big Spring Sale. The NYXI Wizard, a pro-style controller that works in handheld and docked modes, is on sale for $59.49 (was $70).

See at Amazon<
title: Handheld Nintendo Switch Controller With GameCube Form Factor Is Discounted At Amazon

description:
Netflix Gaming boss Alain Tascan has outlined his vision for the future of gaming at Netflix, and his aim is to help reduce "friction" similar to how the Wii helped opened things up for a wider audience.

Speaking to The Game Business, Tascan said when he worked at EA, one of his ambitions was around "lowering friction and eliminating it." He was a big fan of the Wii because it was a lower-priced console that appealed to a wide audience, and Tascan wants to try to achieve something similar at Netflix.

Tascan said some of the frictions that exists in gaming today is the need to have enough controllers in a home and having an "expensive" piece of dedicated gaming hardware. Waiting for game downloads is another friction, Tascan said. Netflix Gaming aims to offer solutions in these areas by eliminating the need for dedicated gaming consoles and controllers, in part because Netflix aims to offe
title: Netflix Gaming Boss Wants To Lower "Friction" And Bypass "Expensive" Consoles

description:
Warner Bros. has released a new clip for A Minecraft Movie, and it doesn't feature any building, crafting, or pickaxes. However, there does seem to be love in the air for an unorthodox pairing. White Lotus actress Jennifer Coolidge's character is on a date at a fancy restaurant with a CGI Villager.

The short new trailer for A Minecraft Movie--titled Be Mine--was shared on YouTube (seen below). The dinner scene is clearly over the top and played for laughs, focusing on Coolidge's character to start. "I recently got divorced from my husband, Clemente, and the main reason is, you know, he didn't have any personality," she says. "Not like you." The camera then shows off the Villager, who moves his unibrow up and down in excitement.
title: New Minecraft Movie Clip Focuses On A Date Night For Unlikely Couple

description:
More than a decade has passed since Silent Hill's last mainline entry--not counting Bloober Team's superb remake of Silent Hill 2 in 2024--but at long last, a new chapter in the franchise is on the way in the form of Silent F. A brand-new mainline entry from a studio in Japan comprised of several survival-horror veterans, Silent Hill F will be the first game in the series to skip the nightmarish streets of Maine in the USA for a terrifying trip to Japan. Here's everything we know about Silent Hill F so far.

Table of Contents [hide]
  • When will Silent Hill F be released?

When will Silent Hill F be released?

There's no solid release date yet for Silent Hill F, but the game is currently available
title: Silent Hill F Release Date, Trailers, And Everything We Know So Far

description:
The new Resident Evil movie from Barbarian director Zach Cregger could feature Oscar-winner Mikey Madison (Anora). According to a new report, there are "whispers" in Hollywood that Madison--who just won the Oscar for Best Actress for Anora--could star in the video game adaptation.

Madison achieved breakout success with Anora, earning her an Oscar. Some of her previous credits included the TV series Better Things and 2022's Scream. She also appeared in Quentin Tarantino's Once Upon a Time... in Hollywood as a member of Charles Manson's gang.

World of Reel's report said Madison has been offered a role in Resident Evil, but that doesn't mean she would necessarily accept it. Deals don't materialize all the time, for any number of reasons, if she is indeed in the mix at all.
title: Here's The Latest Possible Info On The Resident Evil Movie From Barbarian Director
Dragon Quest 1 +2 HD-2D Remake Preorders Are Live At Amazon

description:
The live-action The Legend of Zelda movie now has a release date. The film is scheduled to come to theaters on March 26, 2027. That's about one year after The Super Mario Bros. 2 movie comes out in April 2026, meaning there will be major Nintendo movies in theaters at least two years in a row.

The release date for the Zelda movie was confirmed in the Nintendo Today app.
title: The Legend Of Zelda Live-Action Movie Lands A Release Date, But Still No Word On The Cast

description:
Call of Duty's popular Nuketown map has been reimagined over and over again throughout the series, and the latest evolution of the map--focused on the stoner holiday of 4/20--has now been revealed. Activision also announced a variety of other extras coming to Black Ops 6 themed around marijuana.

The new Nuketown variant is called "Blazetown," and it'll be available in Black Ops 6 multiplayer with the Season 3 Reloaded update at some point in the future. It's likely it'll be available by 4/20. Activision has only shared one image of Blazetown, but it does confirm one of the buses is decked out with flower power.

A 4/20 version of Nuketown, Blazetown, is coming to Black Ops 6 with the Season 03 Reloaded update.
title: CoD's Iconic Nuketown Map Gets A 4/20 Makeover Soon In Black Ops 6
